defaults.auto_format_notes: Entries not present in 'map' should be formatted programmatically by: replacing '_' with spaces, and title-casing each word. If a formatted value contains a dot ('.'), the dot indicates a subtitle split and will be displayed as separate action-bar messages.

map.all_remaining_personnel: All Remaining Personnel Are Advised To. Proceed With Standard Evacuation Protocols. Until An MTF Squad Reaches Your Destination.
map.scp_0_remaining: Substantial Threat to Safety Remains within the Facility. Exercise Caution.
map.scp_multiple_remaining: Awaiting Recontainment Of. An Uncalled Number Of SCP's.
map.xmas_bouncyballs: Bouncy Balls. Bouncy Balls. Bouncing All Away. Oh What Fun It Is To Die. So Hold Your Head And Pray. Bouncy Balls. Bouncy Balls. Bouncing All Away. Oh What Fun It Is To Die. So Hold Your Head And Pray.
map.xmas_hasentered: Has Entered The Workshop. All Remaining Elves Are Advised To Seek Shelter. In The Nearest Gingerbread House. Until The Unit Has Festivized The Facility. Awaiting Recontainment Of.
map.xmas_jinglebells: Jingle Bells. Jingle Bells. Jingle All The Way. Oh What Fun It Is To Ride In A One-Horse Open Sleigh.
